mainBoard.name: Angel's Feather
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever a player plays a white spell, you may gain 1 life.

rulings.text: The ability triggers whenever any player, not just you, casts a white spell.

If a player casts a white spell, Angel’s Feather’s ability triggers and is put on the stack on top of that spell. Angel’s Feather’s ability will resolve (causing you to gain 1 life) before the spell does.

mainBoard.text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may gain 1 life.

mainBoard.flavorText: In fire there is the spark of chaos and destruction, the seed of life. In ice there is perfect tranquility, perfect order, and the silence of death.

foreignData.flavorText: Im Feuer steckt der Funke des Chaos und der Zerstörung, der Samen des Lebens. Im Eis ist perfekte Ausgeglichenheit, perfekte Ordnung und die Stille des Todes.
foreignData.name: Eiskalter Manipulator
foreignData.text: {1}, {T}: Tappe ein Artefakt, eine Kreatur oder ein Land deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText: En el fuego está la chispa del caos y la destrucción, la semilla de la vida. En el hielo está la tranquilidad perfecta, el orden perfecto, el silencio de la muerte.
foreignData.name: Manipulador gélido
foreignData.text: {1}, {T}: Gira el artefacto, criatura o tierra objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: Le feu contient l'étincelle du chaos et de la destruction, la graine de la vie. La glace renferme la tranquillité et l'ordre parfaits, et le silence de la mort.
foreignData.name: Manipulateur glacial
foreignData.text: {1}, {T} : Engagez l'artefact ciblé, la créature ciblée, ou le terrain ciblé.

foreignData.flavorText: Nel fuoco c'è la scintilla del caos e della distruzione, il seme della vita. Nel ghiaccio c'è la tranquillità assoluta, l'ordine perfetto e il silenzio della morte.
foreignData.name: Manipolatore Glaciale
foreignData.text: {1}, {T}: TAPpa un artefatto, una creatura o una terra bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 炎の中には混沌の火花と、命の種である破壊とがある。 氷の中には完璧な平穏と、完璧な秩序と、静かなる死とがある。
foreignData.name: 氷の干渉器
foreignData.text: {1}, {T}：アーティファクト１つかクリーチャー１体か土地１つを対象とし、それをタップする。

foreignData.flavorText: No fogo está a centelha do caos e da destruição, a semente da vida. No gelo está a tranqüilidade perfeita, a ordem perfeita e o silêncio da morte.
foreignData.name: Manipulador Gélido
foreignData.text: {1}, {T}: Vire o artefato, a criatura ou o terreno alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: Огонь это хаос и разрушение, основы жизни. Лед это абсолютное спокойствие, идеальный порядок и молчание смерти.
foreignData.name: Ледяной Манипулятор
foreignData.text: {1}, {T}: Поверните целевой артефакт, существо или землю.

foreignData.flavorText: 火焰蕴含着浑沌与毁灭的鼓动，以及生命的种子。 寒冰蕴含着安宁与秩序的完善，以及死亡的寂静。
foreignData.name: 寒冰操弄器
foreignData.text: {1}，{T}：横置目标神器，生物或地。

mainBoard.name: Icy Manipulator
mainBoard.originalText: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

rulings.text: Once a player announces that they’re casting a spell or activating an ability, no player may take other actions until the spell or ability has been paid for. Notably, other players can’t try to tap that player’s permanents to stop them from paying {T} or to stop them from producing enough mana.

mainBoard.text: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.
